# [Interview #261: Robert Jordan's Blog: A TOUCH OF THIS AND THAT BEFORE THE MAYO, Entry #5](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=261#5)

#### Robert Jordan

For Gerald Clay, who is Doctor House? The name isn't familiar to me.
